translation.en: ♪ Don't lie to me ♪
[reporter] Tonight, all roads lead to Turbine Hall…
translation.it: Stasera tutte le strade portano alla Turbine Hall…

translation.en: [reporter] ...where Joburg's high-society will witness
translation.it: dove davanti all'alta società di Joburg

translation.en: the reveal of the first "Face of Bhengu Beauty,"
translation.it: verrà svelato il primo "Volto di Bhengu Beauty"

translation.en: voted for by the public online.
Mogul Don Bhengu is expected to make a speech about these new changes
translation.it: Il magnate Don Bhengu terrà un discorso su questi cambiamenti

translation.en: and the future of the Bhengu Beauty empire.
translation.it: e sul futuro dell'impero Bhengu Beauty.

translation.en: I don't care that the partners want equity.
translation.it: Non m'importa se i soci vogliono il capitale.

translation.en: -Draw up the papers! -[glass clinks]
This expansion is happening on Don Bhengu's terms.
translation.it: Questa espansione si fa a modo mio.

translation.en: End of story.
Jesus!
I can talk to the Kenyans, Ngcolosi.
The last time I went to Nairobi they were putty in my hands.
translation.it: L'ultima volta a Nairobi li avevo in pugno.

translation.en: The new face of Bhengu must have mass appeal.
translation.it: Il nuovo volto di Bhengu deve piacere.

translation.en: [in Sotho] They won’t need equity to make money…
[in English] Save that enthusiasm for telling the maid how to clean, Grace.
translation.it: Usa questo entusiasmo per comandare la donna delle pulizie.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I know you’re natural-born rubbish, Thando.
translation.it: Sei un disastro già di tuo.

translation.en: [in English] Don't make it worse with your drinking.
Excuse me?
You had to be carried out at the minister's party.
translation.it: Dall'ultima festa ti hanno portata via di peso.

translation.en: [in Sotho] You disgraced our husband and the Bhengu name.
translation.it: Hai disonorato tuo marito e i Bhengu.

translation.en: [in English] Please, Grace, I was fine. You're the one that--
translation.it: Grace, io stavo benissimo, sei tu che…

translation.en: Don't make excuses for being low-class.
translation.it: Sei una pezzente, non trovare scuse.

translation.en: Tonight is about dignity.
Have some.
-And smile. -Enough.
You know, I can't believe they've got us here handing out goodie bags to guests.
translation.it: Non ci credo, ci hanno messe a distribuire i regali agli ospiti.

translation.en: I should be the face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.it: Dovrei essere io il volto di Bhengu Beauty.

translation.en: [woman] I know, right. This Zinhle girl isn't even a real model.
translation.it: Esatto. Questa Zinhle non è nemmeno una modella.

translation.en: And that's why you shouldn't allow the public to vote for the face of Bhengu.
translation.it: Non avrebbero dovuto farla eleggere dalla gente comune.

translation.en: Imagine being able to live with the Bhengu's.
Getting your own car, getting to know Grace.
[gasps] Even chilling with Phila Bhengu.
-Now you see that? -Oh my gosh. That's a different story.
-Oh, he's so hot! -He's so hot!
Oh, my God.
[woman 2] I'll tell him you say hi.
Let's go.
Shit! I have to go.
You guys just order whatever you want to, it's on me.
translation.it: Ordinate quello che volete, offro io.

translation.en: Zinhle, where are you?
Oh my God, you're doing my job again.
It's just a little foundation, Sisi.
translation.it: È solo un po' di fondotinta, cara.

translation.en: My foundation, darling.
-But I like doing it. -That's okay, I'm fine with it.
translation.it: - Mi piace truccarmi da sola. - Tranquilla, va bene.

translation.en: [reporter] Past faces of Bhengu Beauty have been supermodels, actresses, and celebrities.
translation.it: In passato, i volti di Bhengu Beauty erano top model, attrici, VIP.

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty faced harsh criticism
over their overly-edited images
translation.it: per le sue foto pesantemente ritoccate

translation.en: encouraging unrealistic standards of beauty.
translation.it: che promuovono standard di bellezza irraggiungibili.

translation.en: Some wonder if the choice to go with an unknown face
translation.it: La scelta di un volto sconosciuto

translation.en: signals real change at Bhengu Beauty
or is it simply lip service?
But as we can see tonight,
even though the public was asked to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.it: nonostante sia stato il pubblico a votare il volto di Bhengu,

translation.en: the only guests here are an elite bunch.
translation.it: gli invitati di stasera sono tutti dell'alta società.

translation.en: And now it seems Mr. Bhengu and his two wives have arrived.
translation.it: Pare che sia arrivato il signor Bhengu con le sue due mogli.

translation.en: Mr. Bhengu?
-Mr. Bhengu? -Hey, Angela. [chuckles]
[in Xhosa] I told you Angela's not welcome at Bhengu events.
translation.it: Avevo detto che non la volevo ai nostri eventi.

translation.en: [in English] She's a very powerful journalist, what she says goes. This is big.
translation.it: Angela è una giornalista influente. È una grande occasione.

translation.en: So, Dad, what do you think?
[in Xhosa] Excellent job, my girl.
[in English] Don't stress!
[in Xhosa] Have some champagne and meet some nice girls.
translation.it: Bevi dello champagne, conosci qualche ragazza.

translation.en: [in English] The walls could have been bigger.
Of course, Grace.
You did great, Linda.
[man] This way for a photo.
Sorry I'm late.
Why do you insist on looking like a garden boy, Ndumiso?
translation.it: Ndumiso, perché sei vestito da giardiniere?

translation.en: -Come on, Ma. -Smile.
[in Xhosa] We’re taking the family photo with or without Phila.
translation.it: Faremo la foto di famiglia con o senza Phila.

translation.en: -[in English] Hi, fam. -[Don] You're late.
I made it with five minutes to spare.
translation.it: Sono in anticipo di cinque minuti.

translation.en: Hi.
[in Xhosa] Let's do this.
[in English] Bhengu smile.
[Don] That's baby number what?
[Grace] Six.
[in Xhosa] Where’s your baby number one?
[in English] Mr. Bhengu, quick question, please.
translation.it: Signor Bhengu, una domanda al volo.

translation.en: Why ask the public to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty
translation.it: Perché avete chiesto alla gente comune di eleggere il volto di Bhengu

translation.en: but not have them at this event?
You sure your company's committed to the things you speak about?
translation.it: Il marchio intende mantenere le promesse fatte?

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Reserve your questions until after the launch.
translation.it: Si tenga le domande per dopo il lancio.

translation.en: [in English] And then you can be the judge.
[in Xhosa] She's always asking unnecessary questions.
[Thando in English] This is stunning, Linda.
-[Ndu] Well done. -[Linda] Thanks!
[Phila] How much did this cost?
[Linda in Xhosa] No, don’t ask too many questions.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
put your hands together for the CEO of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.it: un applauso per l'AD di Bhengu Beauty,

translation.en: Mr. Don Bhengu!
If you told me 15 years ago that, uh…
translation.it: Se 15 anni fa mi avessero detto

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty would become one of the biggest beauty companies in the country,
translation.it: che Bhengu Beauty sarebbe diventato uno dei marchi più di successo del Paese…

translation.en: soon Africa,
I would have told you,
"You are absolutely right!"
Yes!
I built this company with my own bare hands.
translation.it: Ho costruito questa azienda con le mie mani.

translation.en: No political connections,
no capital,
no help whatsoever.
But tonight…
tonight we are here to unveil the new face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.it: Stasera vi sveleremo il nuovo volto di Bhengu Beauty.

translation.en: I left the choice to a public vote because
translation.it: Ho chiesto al pubblico di votare

translation.en: I wanted to provide an opportunity to someone who reminds me of myself,
translation.it: perché volevo dare un'opportunità a qualcuno che mi ricorda me

translation.en: before I became the Don Bhengu.
translation.it: prima che diventassi questo Don Bhengu.

translation.en: Someone without privilege,
someone unvarnished,
an underdog to represent us all.
Ladies and gentlemen…
ushering in a new dawn as the newest face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.it: il nuovo volto di Bhengu Beauty per un nuovo inizio del marchio,

translation.en: What the hell?
[in Sotho] Linda! Go fix it.
[in English] Now. Now. Go. Go.
Looks like Bhengu Beauty hasn't changed its colors after all.
translation.it: Bhengu Beauty perde il pelo, ma non il vizio.

translation.en: [Ndu] Hey.
I could get you something a little stronger if you like.
translation.it: Se vuoi ti porto qualcosa di più forte?

translation.en: [Don in Xhosa] What nonsense is this? Now we look like fools.
translation.it: Cosa cavolo è successo? Abbiamo fatto la figura degli idioti.

translation.en: [Grace] Let's take this home.
[Don] Damn it.
Everyone’s going to call us hypocrites.
[in English] Ndu, take Zinhle to the car.
-How did this-- -Why must I repeat myself. Just do it.
[in Xhosa] Did you mess this up? You too busy partying?
translation.it: Sei stato tu? Pensi solo a divertirti.

translation.en: [Phila in English] I didn't do this!
I specifically told the designers to not change her complexion.
translation.it: Avevo detto di non ritoccare il colore della pelle.

translation.en: -Everything was perfect when I-- -Obviously not!
translation.it: - Era perfetto quando… - Non mi pare!

translation.en: We're trying to show we're not stuck in the past
translation.it: Vogliamo dimostrare che guardiamo al futuro…

translation.en: -and what do-- -[Linda] I'll fix it!
I'll get to the bottom of this. Listen…
[in Xhosa] I’m sorry.
I’m sorry.
[in English] Get Peter to bring the car.
[Don in Xhosa] This is a disaster.
The driver could have brought me.
[scoffs] No, I don't mind.
Yeah. [clears throat]
This is all going blow over in like a day or two.
translation.it: Tra qualche giorno se ne saranno già dimenticati.

translation.en: You'll see for yourself.
I don't know how anyone could be so negligent. You know?
Okay, let me.
It's okay. I can do it.
translation.it: Dai, ce la faccio da sola.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
I bet this has never happened to Naomi Campbell.
translation.it: A Naomi Campbell non è mai capitato.

translation.en: Oh no, actually it has. I once helped her out just like this.
translation.it: Le è capitato eccome. E ho aiutato anche lei.

translation.en: I'm joking. I've never met her. [laughs]
Very funny.
Give me your hand.
-Okay… -Okay.
There you go.
This…
-Of course. -For you.
Thank you.
You'll get your jacket tomorrow.
[Ndu] Sure.
[Don] Damn it.
Twitter is abuzz.
Ah, yeah, well, Linda will figure out what happened, and we will do what we do best.
translation.it: Linda capirà cos'è successo e noi faremo ciò che facciamo di solito.

translation.en: We will handle it.
Relax, old man.
[Thando] Actually, I'm going to my room.
No, you stay exactly where you are. I need everyone here.
translation.it: Non muoverti. Mi servite tutti qui.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Regina, call Zinhle.
[in English] I need a double.
Thando will do it.
You can see your favorite son is already doing it.
translation.it: Il tuo figlio preferito lo sta già facendo.

translation.en: I'll have a Chardonnay.
What a fuck-up.
[in Zulu] Dad.
[in English] As I said, we will handle it.
My people are already tweeting in our favor.
translation.it: Sto già facendo scrivere dei tweet a nostro favore.

translation.en: -[Thando] Do you want a drink? -Yeah.
There you are, Zinhle.
-[in Sotho] Any journalists called you? -No, Mam' Grace.
translation.it: - Ti ha contattata la stampa? - No.

translation.en: If they do, no comment.
[in English] That goes for all of you.
PR is coming over, and we're going to say it was a technical malfunction.
translation.it: Sta arrivando la responsabile PR, diremo che è stato un problema tecnico.

translation.en: Get it?
End of story.
You can go.
[Grace] Yes.
[in Sotho] Do you remember that I still need to go to my cousin's after-funeral cleansing?
translation.it: Avrei il rito di purificazione per la morte di mio cugino.

translation.en: [in English] Your cousin is not family, Zinhle.
translation.it: Lui non è parte della famiglia.

translation.en: The events company messed up the images. They can't explain what happened.
translation.it: L'organizzatore dell'evento ha fatto un casino, ma non sa come.

translation.en: -[Grace] Linda, that's not good enough. -I know that, Grace.
translation.it: Linda, è troppo poco. Lo so, Grace.

translation.en: Okay, that's why I fired them.
-[Don] Good night. -Ahem. Good night.
Dad, is there anything I…
[Don] No, you've already done enough.
[in Sotho] What did I say to you
about your sulking in public?
translation.it: riguardo al tenere il muso in pubblico?

translation.en: [in English] I'm so sorry.
Drink, Mom?
No thanks, and put that down. No more drinking for you.
translation.it: No, grazie e basta anche per te.

translation.en: -Yes, definitely not. -You called?
[sighs] We need to talk.
[Zinhle] Your favorite.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
[in Zulu] To be honest…
[in English] I should be getting you chocolates after the day you had.
translation.it: Servono più a te, dopo la serataccia di ieri.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Are you okay?
[in English] It was weird seeing my face like that, as though it was bleached or something.
translation.it: È stato stranissimo vedere il mio viso sbiancato.

translation.en: [in Zulu] But I'm okay.
I'm sorry.
[in English] How much damage do you think this will do to Bhengu Beauty?
[in Zulu] I don't know.
[in English] As you heard, PR statements are being made, woh, woh, woh, woh.
I wonder how long people will be talking about it.
translation.it: Mi chiedo per quanto ne parlerà la gente.

translation.en: What did I do to deserve these, really?
[in Zulu] I just wanted to thank you.
[in English] For being my friend here for the past four weeks.
translation.it: Per la tua amicizia in questo mese.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You'll get used to this place.
[in English] Even the royal bitchness herself.
translation.it: Anche a Sua Maestà la Stronza.

translation.en: But, it's good to have a new friend around here.
translation.it: Ma è bello avere un'amica qui dentro.

translation.en: Oh, Don.
[in Sotho] Where are you off to?
[in English] Partners are freaked out after last night.
translation.it: I soci sono impazziti dopo ieri sera.

translation.en: I need to make a few calls.
[in Sotho] I'll ask Regina to bring some coffee to the study.
translation.it: Ti faccio portare del caffè nello studio da Regina.

translation.en: [in English] I'm actually going to the office.
[in Sotho] It's Saturday. I've arranged a relaxing spa treatment.
translation.it: È sabato. Ho prenotato un trattamento relax alla spa.

translation.en: [in English] I'll be back for dinner.
[Zinhle] How's everything with you?
[in Zulu] Yesterday you seemed like you were a little sad.
[in English] You know what it's like with Grace.
"Smile, dear, we're in public."
It's exhausting.
What's it like being a second wife?
translation.it: Com'è essere la sua seconda moglie?

translation.en: I wouldn't recommend it,
but what I do recommend is some wine with these chocolates.
translation.it: ciò che consiglio, invece, è del vino con questi cioccolatini.

translation.en: Hmm? Stolen from Grace's collection, of course.
[chuckles] It's not even midday yet. -[Thando] Really? -Mmm.
But it is the weekend, right?
translation.it: Ma è il fine settimana, giusto?

translation.en: [woman] I'm coming.
Hi! I missed you so much.
I'll bet you did.
Of course.
Oh, babe, I heard about the launch.
Shh. I'm not here for that. No?
translation.it: - Non sono qui per questo. - No?

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
[Don] I've got something for you.
-You do? -Yes.
It's so beautiful! Thank you.
-[Don] Wait, babe… -Hmm?
[Don] Stop.
-What? -Call an ambulance.
What do you mean? What's going on?
-Stop… -Oh my God, what's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.it: - Fermati… - Oddio, cosa c'è? Stai bene?

translation.en: Call an ambulance.
[Ruby] Babe, what's wrong? Okay.
[in Sotho] I don't know.
Grace doesn't want me to go.
translation.it: Grace ha detto che non posso venire.

translation.en: She took…
I have to go, I'll call you back.
[in English] Does… Does Mam' Grace need me?
No, um…
Would you like to grab something to eat?
I figured you could use an escape.
Ah. Thanks, but I'm going to sleep early.
translation.it: Grazie, ma stavo andando a letto.

translation.en: Of course. Um… yeah, just shout if you need anything.
translation.it: Certo… Chiama se hai bisogno di qualcosa.

translation.en: [in Sotho] That's the spot.
[in English] No, man.
Oh, Noni. Eish!
Yes?
Where is he?
[in Sotho] We're here for Don Benghu. Where is he?
-[in English] Is he okay? -With you in a second. [Linda] Please, just tell us.
translation.it: Sta bene? Per favore, ci dica qualcosa.

translation.en: Hey! When I talk to you, you listen!
-Where's my husband? -Mama, she's gonna get to us.
translation.it: - Dov'è mio marito? - Mamma, dalle tempo.

translation.en: Is there a doctor or someone we can talk to?
Mrs. Bhengu?
[in Sotho] What kind of service is this? You're a private hospital and we're waiting in reception?
translation.it: Che servizio date? È una clinica privata e ci fate aspettare?

translation.en: -[in English] Where's my husband? -[in Tswana] Sorry, ma'am. Come with me.
translation.it: Dov'è mio marito? Mi dispiace. Venite con me.

translation.en: [in English] Just tell us if he's okay.
[in Zulu] Sis' Regina, where's everyone?
[in Xhosa] They're all at the hospital. Bab' Don had a heart attack.
translation.it: In ospedale. Il signor Don ha avuto un infarto.

translation.en: -[in Tswana] He's in surgery right now. -[Linda in English] How long will it take?
translation.it: È in sala operatoria. Quanto ci vorrà?

translation.en: He has a history of coronary artery disease. When can we talk to the doctor?
translation.it: - Ha già problemi alle coronarie. - Possiamo parlare col medico?

translation.en: [in Tswana] I'll have more information after the surgery.
translation.it: Vi saprò dire di più dopo l'intervento.

translation.en: [in English] Excuse me.
Okay guys, whoa. It's just a little scare, okay.
translation.it: Ok, ragazzi. Non è niente di grave.

translation.en: Dad is still young.
This stays right here. We've had enough PR disasters already.
translation.it: La notizia non deve trapelare, siamo già abbastanza nei casini.

translation.en: [Ndu] Mama, who cares about PR?
Dad just has a heart attack.
[in Sotho] We can't have people speculating.
Phila, find out who he was with at the office when this happened.
translation.it: Phila, scopri chi c'era in ufficio con lui.

translation.en: They can't talk.
[in English] Done.
[Grace in Sotho] Linda.
-[in English] What? -[Grace] It's all your fault.
[in Sotho] Your carelessness…
[in English] Are you fucking kidding, Grace Mama, come on, that's unfair.
translation.it: - Che cazzo dici, Grace? - Mamma, non essere ingiusta.

translation.en: Linda, she didn't mean that.
Of course I did.
-[sucks teeth] -[Zinhle] Hey.
[Grace in Sotho] What are you doing here?
Sis' Regina told me what had happened.
translation.it: Regina mi ha detto cos'è successo.

translation.en: [in English] I thought I'd bring some snacks.
I doubt anyone is hungry.
Thank you.
It's like you read my mind. I'm famished.
translation.it: Mi hai letto nel pensiero. Ho una gran fame.

translation.en: [Zinhle] How's Bab' Don?
[Ndu] Um, still in surgery.
What is it?
He wasn't in the office.
His driver insisted he was there.
translation.it: Il suo autista ha detto di sì.

translation.en: [Phila] They found him at the company penthouse.
Was he alone?
I don't know.
Hey, this looks good. Is this you?
translation.it: Ehi, sembra squisito. L'hai portato tu?

translation.en: -It's the least I could do. -Thank you.
You can go.
And don't you dare tell anyone about this.
translation.it: e non dire niente a nessuno.

translation.en: Let me know if you need anything else.
translation.it: Fatemi sapere se vi serve altro.

translation.en: [Thando] Thanks.
Oh yeah, um… let me walk you out.
No, no, it's fine.
Stay with everyone. I'll be okay.
translation.it: Resta con gli altri. Me la caverò.

translation.en: -Hey. -Coffee?
Thank you.
You know that…
[in Xhosa] my father…
[in English] I don't have any family.
[in Zulu] But that's not true.
[in English] Ndu and Phila, they have Grace, and…
translation.it: Ndu e Phila hanno Grace e…

translation.en: -[Thando] But you've got me. -Yeah.
[Thando] No matter what, Grace cannot get rid of you.
translation.it: Grace non può sbarazzarsi di te.

translation.en: And you? [sniffs]
Well, it wouldn't be the worst thing, right?
translation.it: Beh, non sarebbe la fine del mondo, no?

translation.en: [in Zulu] Your father is going to make it through.
Don't worry.
Shit.
[Thando] What?
Bhengu boys, your father's going to need a lot of support at the office.
translation.it: Ragazzi, vostro padre avrà bisogno di aiuto in ufficio.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Ma, can we stop talking about business for a second?
translation.it: Mamma, smettila di parlare di affari.

translation.en: [in English] How are you? We could lose Dad.
translation.it: Come stai? Papà è in pericolo di vita.

translation.en: Okay, hold on. We're not going to lose him.
translation.it: Ok, aspetta. Non è in pericolo di vita.

translation.en: I mean… But he is right. Maybe we can cool it on the business talk.
translation.it: Ma ha ragione. Magari smettiamo di parlare di affari.

translation.en: Your father's going to need a successor sooner than later.
translation.it: Ora più che mai, a vostro padre serve un successore.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Think Linda's just "chilling" right now?
translation.it: Credi che Linda non ci stia pensando?

translation.en: [in English] If that happens, then he's going to choose me.
Someone leaked the news of Dad all over social media.
translation.it: La notizia è su tutti i social media.

translation.en: -What? -They said he's dying.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Dicono che è in fin di vita.

translation.en: What did I say to all of you?
[in Sotho] I said do not speak to the press!
translation.it: Di non parlarne con la stampa!

translation.en: Who was it?
[in English] Who said something, guys? Who?
[Linda] Maybe it's Zinhle.
-Did you say-- -She's always around, so it makes sense.
Maybe someone heard us at reception.
Look, I will talk to the board, okay.
translation.it: Vado a parlare col consiglio, ok.

translation.en: And we'll make sure that we…
[in Sotho] Can we see him?
[in Tswana] Yes, you can. But he's still resting.
translation.it: - Possiamo vederlo? - Sì. Ma sta riposando.

translation.en: [in English] To help with recovery. So bear that in mind.
[in Sotho] Don't you ever scare us like that again.
translation.it: Ci hai fatto prendere un colpo.

translation.en: [Linda in Xhosa] Dad, please hold on.
Please, I still need you.
translation.it: Ti prego, ho bisogno di te.

translation.en: [Grace] Linda.
[in English] Thank you.
Well, I know that you're gonna be out of here in a couple of days. So…
translation.it: Un paio di giorni e sarai di nuovo in forma, quindi…

translation.en: [Ndu] Stay strong, Dad.
We love you.
Get well, Ngcolosi.
Excuse me, hi, did I not leave my phone here?
translation.it: Scusi, ho lasciato qui il mio telefono?

translation.en: [Linda] This is a curse.
[sighs] And this is my cue to go to bed.
translation.it: Io me ne vado a letto.

translation.en: Good night, everybody. Thank you.
If it isn't a curse, what is it? First the launch…
translation.it: Se non è una maledizione, cos'è? Prima il lancio,

translation.en: [in Xhosa] …and now Dad. This is a curse.
-[in English] It's not a curse. -Uh-huh. Thank you.
translation.it: Non è una maledizione. - Grazie. - È un'opportunità.

translation.en: But it is an opportunity.
-Guys, we've been wasting our time… -Ndumiso.
[in Sotho] It's not time for one of your sermons. Go to bed.
translation.it: Non farci la predica come al solito. Vai a letto.

translation.en: Why are you up?
I was worried.
How is Bab' Don doing?
[in English] That's not for you to worry about.
[in Sotho] Go to sleep.
[Ndu in English] She's just trying to be nice, Mom.
[in Sotho] Did you tell anyone about Don's heart attack?
translation.it: Hai detto a qualcuno dell'infarto di Don?

translation.en: No, Mam' Grace. My phone's been off the whole night.
translation.it: No, Grace. Ho spento il telefono.

translation.en: [in English] Good.
Oh, that cleansing thing…
you can go.
[in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] Some of these vultures.
[in Sotho] They wish their cards read "Rest in Peace."
Goodness!
You'd swear I'm the one who had a heart attack.
translation.it: Ora viene a me un infarto.

translation.en: Get rid of these flowers.
Justice… were you on duty when my husband had a heart attack?
translation.it: Justice, eri in servizio quando mio marito è stato male? Con chi era?

translation.en: Who was he with?
translation.it: eri in servizio quando mio marito è stato male? Con chi era?

translation.en: Yay-hey!
[in Sotho] Hey, bro.
-Yay! -[in English] I made it. What up, though?
[in Sotho] I missed you.
I'm here now.
I thought I'd have to drag you back home. Hmm?
translation.it: Pensavo di doverti portare a casa con la forza.

translation.en: [in English] No. There's no need.
Okay.
[in Sotho] Let's go inside. Makhosi Mnisi is waiting.
translation.it: Entriamo. Makhosi Mnisi ci sta aspettando.

translation.en: -[Zinhle] This feels so final. -Yeah.
[in Sotho] We have to stay strong for her.
[Zinhle in Zulu] Greetings, Makhosi.
I still need to see other people. You're wasting my time.
translation.it: Devo vedere altre persone, mi fate perdere tempo.

translation.en: [Zinhle] I'm sorry. But I have a bottle of whiskey for you.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Ho una bottiglia di whisky per lei.

translation.en: Good girl.
Where's my whiskey?
Let's get to work.
[in Xhosa] Praise God.
When did you wake up?
I've been up for a while now.
How are you feeling?
[in English] I'm so fit, I could run a marathon.
translation.it: Sono pronto a correre una maratona.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I've brought someone to see you.
[in English] Who's that?
[in Xhosa] Goodness.
[in English] What a pleasant surprise.
[in Xhosa] I'm glad to see you awake.
translation.it: Mi fa piacere che tu sia sveglio.

translation.en: I brought a few traditional things. [in Zulu] These Western doctors also need help.
translation.it: Ti ho portato dei rimedi tradizionali per aiutare i medici occidentali.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Now we are talking.
[Makhosi in Zulu] Ancestors of the Selepe family,
the Elders and Protectors of this family,
I ask that you allow me as a healer
to cleanse these kids.
To cleanse them because there isn't an elder to do so.
translation.it: Lo faccio io perché non c'è nessun anziano che possa farlo.

translation.en: Please allow me to remove this dark cloud that follows them.
translation.it: Vi prego, permettetemi di eliminare la nube scura che incombe su di loro.

translation.en: And to remove these dark spirits that follow them.
translation.it: E di scacciare gli spiriti oscuri che li perseguitano.

translation.en: Spirits that took their sister, Amahle.
translation.it: E che hanno portato via la loro sorella, Amahle.

translation.en: Please allow me to do this so that their paths can be cleared.
translation.it: Vi prego, permettetemi di spianare loro la strada.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] It's strong.
Can you feel it?
I can feel it working already.
-That's good. -[clears throat]
-That's what we want to hear. -[chuckles]
translation.it: È ciò che volevamo sentirci dire.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I didn't know you called for Simphiwe
translation.it: Non sapevo avessi chiesto di lei.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I brought her, Grace.
[in Sotho] Linda, you know your father's treatments can't…
translation.it: Linda, le cure di tuo padre…

translation.en: [in English] I know what's good for me, Grace.
translation.it: So cosa è meglio per me, Grace.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Thank you, my child. You can go.
-[Linda] All right. -Simphiwe.
You've really helped me.
[in English] We should be more careful. [Don] Sit down.
What did the doctor say? I said sit down.
translation.it: - Cos'ha detto il medico? - Ho detto di sedervi.

translation.en: There's going to be a few changes in our lives.
I need more children.
[Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids.
[in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
translation.it: Un altro infarto mi sarà fatale.

translation.en: I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.it: Non ho tempo da perdere, quindi prenderò un'altra moglie.

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
translation.it: Ho già trovato chi mi darà dei figli.

translation.en: You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.it: Ti serve il mio permesso per farlo!

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
[in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you so he could have his entertainment at home.
translation.it: Ho permesso a mio marito di sposarti per divertirsi dentro casa.

translation.en: Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here?
[in English] What's that?
Do you want to go and ask him yourself?
[in Zulu] You heard what he said.
He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.it: Vuole altri figli e sappiamo entrambe che non posso…

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
Smile, dear, we're in public.
[Ruby] Excuse me!
[in Zulu] Who are you?
[Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
[in Zulu] Who are you?
I'm Ruby.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
translation.it: È proprio… un nome da puttana, no?

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
[in English] Test her.
Test me for what?
I'm not pregnant. Why would…
I'm calling security.
No, you're not!
Your choice.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
translation.it: Vuoi essere cosciente o no mentre lo fai?

translation.en: I'm not the bad guy here.
You're the one sleeping with my husband.
translation.it: Sei tu quella che va a letto con mio marito.

translation.en: We can do this painlessly if you want.
Good girl.
Now go with the lovely nurse.
[in Sotho] Why are you laughing?
-Nana? -[groans]
[in Sotho] Are you okay?
I'm fine.
For Chancer.
For helping me win the online competition
and the pictures at the launch.
translation.it: e per le foto al lancio.

translation.en: No problem.
How're you coping?
How are you coping?
You're all alone here now.
I'm fine.
I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.it: Non devo vedere Grace e Don tutti i santi giorni.

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
translation.it: Sono riuscita a entrare nella stanza di Don all'ospedale.

translation.en: He looked so weak.
He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.it: Non assomigliava affatto all'uomo cattivo della nostra infanzia.

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
You're not a murderer.
I know.
He has to live…
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.it: e vederci distruggere tutto ciò che ama.

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.it: Sono passati solo sei mesi dalla morte di Amahle.

translation.en: If you need time…
-Time? -If you want to back out…
I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.it: Non mi serve tempo. È qualcosa che va fatto.

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
translation.it: Hai quello che ti ho chiesto?

translation.en: I did, but you don't need it.
I do.
[in English] Just in case things go wrong.
translation.it: Se le cose si mettono male.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Sotho] We're in this together.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
How old are you?
[in English] Twenty-two, 23, 24--
Twenty-one.
Twenty what?
-Twenty-one. -Twenty-one?
You're a baby.
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three.
translation.it: Se lo sposi, sarai la sua terza moglie.

translation.en: Last on the list.
[in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
translation.it: Ti metterà incinta il prima possibile.

translation.en: [in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.it: Ma non per questo smetterà di andare a letto con le altre.

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
translation.it: Il mondo è pieno di Ruby.

translation.en: By the time you turn 23…
[in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
translation.it: ti sentirai in trappola. Sai perché?

translation.en: [in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.it: Perché i Bhengu non si macchiano dell'onta del divorzio.

translation.en: Goodness.
[in English] Negative.
Perfect.
Now,
if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
translation.it: se non vuoi soffrire per il resto della tua vita,

translation.en: you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
translation.it: dirai e farai tutto ciò che ti dico per filo e per segno.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Understood?
[in Xhosa] You're back.
[in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.it: C'è Grace? Volevo dirle che sono tornata.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] She's not here.
[in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.it: Cena con me. O un sacco di cibo andrà sprecato.

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
Come. Come sit down.
Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
translation.it: - Posso chiederti… - Come sta tuo padre?

translation.en: Oh, he's coming back tomorrow.
He's awake?
[chuckles] Yeah. Actually, he's doing well.
[Zinhle] Who took these?
[Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
[Zinhle] They're really good.
Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.it: Sì. Ne stavo cercando una da stampare e incorniciare

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
translation.it: come regalo di bentornato per papà.

translation.en: -Uh… [laughs] -[in Zulu] Is this you?
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago.
translation.it: Sì, ma era due anni fa.

translation.en: When I used to copy everything Phila used to do, before the accident.
translation.it: Quando imitavo sempre Phila, prima dell'incidente.

translation.en: What accident?
Check this out.
I crashed my Porsche.
translation.it: Mi sono schiantato con la Porsche.

translation.en: They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.it: Mi hanno estratto dalle lamiere. Due mesi di convalescenza.

translation.en: I remember thinking to myself,
I could have died without living a meaningful life.
translation.it: che sarei morto, senza aver vissuto appieno.

translation.en: Wow.
Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.it: Ora passo il tempo a cercare il significato profondo della vita.

translation.en: [chuckles] Still looking.
I have to go.
Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
I'm home.
What the hell is this?
Hey.
What's this?
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.it: Me ne vado, Don. Non ce la faccio più.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
-Come here. -No.
This repulsive relationship is over.
Repulsive?
You're old enough to be my father,
and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
translation.it: e io merito molto più di un contratto.

translation.en: [Don] An arrangement?
I want to marry you, start a family.
You already have a family.
Please don't… don't go.
I'm sorry I have to go,
and please delete my number.
translation.it: e, ti prego, cancella il mio numero.

translation.en: Ruby.
[in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.it: È sopravvissuto a un infarto, non vogliamo che si strozzi col cibo.

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
[in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.
translation.it: No, lo accompagna il suo autista.

translation.en: Morning, Mam' Grace.
[in English] Zinhle. Looking good.
[in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
translation.it: Grazie per avermi permesso di andare alla purificazione ieri.

translation.en: [in English] Nice hair.
[in Sotho] The styles I arranged…
you've switched them up, huh?
I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
translation.it: Mi piace anche il vestito. Girati.

translation.en: Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
translation.it: Fatti un selfie e mandalo a Sonto del reparto social media.

translation.en: [in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
translation.it: E ritoccati il trucco, stai sudando.

translation.en: I'll do that.
[in Sotho] You know, in my day…
you had to be taller and lighter… to be considered beautiful.
translation.it: bisognava essere alti e magri per essere considerati belli.

translation.en: [Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.it: Ma ti sembrano cose da dire?

translation.en: [Grace] I'm just saying.
[in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.it: Quando ha vinto la gara, volevo annullare i risultati.

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model, but she is beautiful and she is likable.
translation.it: Sì, non è la tipica modella, ma è bella e simpatica.

translation.en: You're right.
There's something recognizable about her.
[Phila] Yeah?
Oh, Regina.
[in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
translation.it: Dammi il coltello. Ti faccio vedere.

translation.en: Like this.
[in English] You can let go, Nana.
[in Sotho] They will pay.
I'll make sure of it.
[sniffling] Amahle. Amahle. Amahle!
